name: Sibling Rivalry
text: Give to the Betsy Braddock player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: * Exhaust Betsy Braddock → remove Sibling Rivalry from the game. * Discard each event from your hand. If no cards are discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: King Jamie Braddock
text: Villainous. [star] Forced Interrupt: When King Jamie Braddock schemes, if the Fractured Realities side scheme is in play place the threat on it instead. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for the Fractured Realities side scheme and put it into play.

name: Fractured Realities
text: The villain cannot take damage. Forced Interrupt: When the villain would attack, put 1 threat on the main scheme instead. [crisis]

name: Quantum Teleportation
text: Attach to King Jamie Braddock. Otherwise, attach to the villain. Uses (3 teleport counters). Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy would take any amount of damage, remove 1 teleport counter from this card → prevent all of that damage.

name: Backlash
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. For each event discarded this way, take 1 indirect damage. [star] Boost: For each event in your hand, this card gains 1 boost icon (to a maximum of 4).
